Description: Sets the name of the server to be displayed in the server list
Sets a description of the server to be displayed in the server list

Comma separated list of up to 5 server tags to display in the server list. Available tags: 0 (PvP), 1 (PvE), 2 (EXP Multiplier), 3 (Gathering Rate), 4 (Keep Inventory), 5 (45 day wipe), 6 (15 day wipe), 7 (30 day wipe), 8 (60 day wipe)
Sets a unique ID for the server. Default = random 8 digit number
Sets the password required to connect to the server. Default is no password
Sets the maximum number of players that may connect to the server at one time
Semi-colon separated list of [Steam64 IDs](https://www.steamidfinder.com/) of server admins
If enabled, the special admin icon will be shown
If set, the server's anticheat system will be enabled
Sets the next date on which all server data will be wiped. Format: YYYY-MM-DD
Sets the server framerate
If set, the server's autosave will be enabled
Sets the server autosave interval. Requires Autosave to be enabled

If enabled, Steam servers will be used for network penetration. Enable this if you don't have a public IP but want to allow players from outside your network to join the server. DON'T enable this if you have a public IP. This setting will impact server latency
Specifies additional command line parameters that are not otherwise set by AMP. Example: -JumpRate="1". ONE LINE ONLY! Use with care
If set, PvE mode will be enabled, and PvP mode disabled. In PvP mode, players can attack other players and their structures. In PvE mode they cannot
If enabled, players can damage themselves
If enabled, squadmates can damage each other
Sets the stack limit for each type of item
When enabled, all recipes and talents will be unlocked for new characters
Sets how many inventory slots a new character gets by default
If enabled, new characters will receive novice protection
Semi-colon separated list of items a character gets on respawn. Format: ItemID, Quality, Amount
Sets the mode for dropping items on death

EnumValues.2: Drop inventory (not equipped or hotkey items)

Description: Sets the amount of time after which items dropped on death will disappear
Sets the permission level for looting corpses
If enabled, creatures and structures will drop items when killed/destroyed
If enabled, players can discard items
Sets the amount of time after which items discarded will disappear
Sets the basic (or starting) revival cooldown duration
Sets the amount of time by which the revival cooldown increases after multiple deaths
Sets the number of deaths required for a cooldown penalty to be applied
Sets the time after which stacked revival cooldowns are reset
If enabled, structures will decay
Sets the maximum distance at which a player can see a squadmate's name
Sets the maximum distance at which a player can see a non-squadmate's name
Sets the maximum distance at which a player can see an NPC's name
If enabled, the location of other players' Beacons will be displayed on the map
If enabled, players will be able to send chat messages in-game
If enabled, blood effects will be shown
If set, the profanity filter will be disabled
If enabled, the wounded state will be triggered when HP falls to 0, rather than the player immediately dying
Sets the multiplier for the time before dead wild NPCs can respawn
Sets the amount of time after which animal NPC corpses will disappear
Sets the amount of time after which human NPC corpses will disappear
Sets the multiplier for the cooldown time between supply deliveries
Sets the multiplier for character heat RES
Sets the multiplier for character cold RES
On death, the durability of equipped items will fall by the maximum durability multiplied by this amount (does not affect drops)
On death, the durability of hotbar items will fall by the maximum durability multiplied by this amount (does not affect drops)
Sets the multiplier for the item crafting/repair time
Sets the multiplier for all XP earned
Sets the multiplier for XP earned from killing monsters
Sets the multiplier for XP earned from collecting resources
Sets the multiplier for XP earned from crafting items
Sets the multiplier for movement speed
Sets the multiplier for jump height
Sets the multiplier for damage taken from falls
Minimum is 0.1
Minimum is 0.1
Minimum is 0.1
Minimum is 0.1
Minimum is 0.1
Minimum is 0.1
